markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Thoughtform](/Feats.aspx?ID=3737) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Psychic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=185)

**Prerequisites**
[Psychic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3736)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [psychic feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=21/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Thoughtform leads to...</title>
[Advanced Thoughtform](/Feats.aspx?ID=3739)
name: Basic Thoughtform
